periods.name: This Afternoon
periods.detailedForecast: Showers and thunderstorms before 5pm, then a chance of showers and thunderstorms. Mostly cloudy. High near 79, with temperatures falling to around 73 in the afternoon. West wind around 8 mph. Chance of precipitation is 90%.

periods.name: Tonight
periods.detailedForecast: A chance of showers and thunderstorms before 4am, then showers and thunderstorms likely. Mostly cloudy. Low around 61, with temperatures rising to around 63 overnight. North northeast wind 2 to 6 mph. Chance of precipitation is 60%.

periods.name: Wednesday
periods.shortForecast: Showers And Thunderstorms Likely then Chance Showers And Thunderstorms
periods.detailedForecast: Showers and thunderstorms likely before 7am, then a chance of showers and thunderstorms between 7am and 8am, then showers and thunderstorms likely between 8am and 11am, then a chance of showers and thunderstorms. Mostly cloudy. High near 80, with temperatures falling to around 78 in the afternoon. Southeast wind 3 to 9 mph. Chance of precipitation is 70%.

periods.name: Wednesday Night
periods.detailedForecast: A chance of showers and thunderstorms before 1am, then showers and thunderstorms likely. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 65. South wind 6 to 10 mph, with gusts as high as 21 mph. Chance of precipitation is 60%.

periods.name: Thursday
periods.detailedForecast: Showers and thunderstorms. Mostly cloudy, with a high near 75. South southwest wind 12 to 15 mph, with gusts as high as 25 mph. Chance of precipitation is 90%.

periods.name: Thursday Night

Partly cloudy, with a low around 57. West southwest wind 6 to 13 mph, with gusts as high as 23 mph. Chance of precipitation is 90%.
